title: Bokkonrinri
sinopse:
Rin had quit calligraphy after her mother's death. Then upon seeing the calligraphy of a high school calligraphy masters, Uchida Dougen, she started learning again. Rin entered the same school as Dougen and the current calligraphy club or more like Dougen fan club. When the student council president announced that the club would be disbanded, Rin had to take action to keep the club going. Dougen, who had come to support the president, ended up joining the club because Rin's word sparked his interest. Unbeknownst to her, Dougen is somewhat of a playboy. What will become of Rin and her beloved Calligraphy club?

(Source: MU)
